titleStmt.title: A second part of Observations, censures, and confutations of divers errours in Mr. Hobbs his Leviathan beginning at the seventeenth chapter of that book. / By William Lucy, Bishop of S. David's.
Observations, censures, and confutations of notorious errours in Mr. Hobbes his Leviathan. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Lucy, William, 1594-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S.G. and B.G. for Edward Man at the White Swan in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
